adddependencies.name: adddependencies
adddependencies.description: Add the missing dependencies to the manifest file.

options.name: all
options.description: Add all missing dependencies to the SuiteCloud project. When specified, ensure that you do not use the -feature, -file, and -object options.

options.name: feature
options.description: Specify the feature dependency references to add to the project. Each reference is a name:value pair that is delimited by a space. For example, CUSTOMRECORD:required. When specified, ensure that you do not use the -all option.

options.name: file
options.description: Specify the files to add to the project. When specified, ensure that you do not use the -all option.

options.name: object
options.description: Specify the object script IDs to add to the project. When specified, ensure that you do not use the -all option.

options.name: project
options.description: Set the folder or zipped file containing the project. It overrides the default project.

options.name: url
options.description: Specify the domain URL. It overrides the SDF file settings.

options.name: email
options.description: Specify your email address. It overrides the SDF file settings.

options.name: account
options.description: Specify your account ID. It overrides the SDF file settings.

options.name: role
options.description: Specify the role ID. It overrides the SDF file settings.

options.name: parentdirectory
options.description: Set the parent folder where to create the project.

options.name: overwrite
options.description: Overwrite the existing project.

options.name: type
options.description: Specify the project type.

options.name: projectname
options.description: Specify the project name.

options.name: publisherid
options.description: Specify the publisher ID. It is mandatory for SuiteApps.

options.name: projectid
options.description: Specify the project ID. It is mandatory for SuiteApps.

options.name: projectversion
options.description: Specify the project version. It is mandatory for SuiteApps.

deploy.name: deploy
deploy.description: Deploy the folder or ZIP file containing the project. The project folder is zipped before deployment, only including the files and folders referenced in the deploy.xml file.

options.name: log
options.description: Sets the deployment log file location, as either a directory or a file name. If it is a directory, a default log file is generated in the specified location. If a log file already exists in the specified location, deployment log details are appended to that existing file.

options.name: validate
options.description: Validate the project before deploying. If an error ocurrs during the deployment, the process is stopped.

options.name: no_preview
options.description: Skip the preview step.

options.name: skip_warning
options.description: Indicates that the warning before deployment to production account will be skipped.

options.name: applycontentprotection
options.description: Apply the content protection settings from the hiding.xml and locking.xml files.

options.name: accountspecificvalues
options.description: Indicate how to handle the presence of account-specific values in an account customization project. If there are account-specific values in the project, enter WARNING to continue with the deployment process, or ERROR to stop it. If the option is not specified, the default value is ERROR.

options.name: project
options.description: Set the folder or zipped file containing the project. It overrides the default project.

options.name: url
options.description: Specify the domain URL. It overrides the SDF file settings.

options.name: email
options.description: Specify your email address. It overrides the SDF file settings.

options.name: account
options.description: Specify your account ID. It overrides the SDF file settings.

options.name: role
options.description: Specify the role ID. It overrides the SDF file settings.

importbundle.name: importbundle
importbundle.description: Import a bundle as an Account Customization project.

options.name: project
options.description: Set the folder or zipped file containing the project. It overrides the default project.

options.name: bundleid
options.description: Specify the bundle ID of the bundle you want to import.

options.name: url
options.description: Specify the domain URL. It overrides the SDF file settings.

options.name: email
options.description: Specify your email address. It overrides the SDF file settings.

options.name: account
options.description: Specify your account ID. It overrides the SDF file settings.

options.name: role
options.description: Specify the role ID. It overrides the SDF file settings.

importconfiguration.name: importconfiguration
importconfiguration.description: Import the features from an account.

options.name: configurationid
options.description: Import account features by their IDs. To specify multiple feature IDs, enter the IDs separated by spaces.

options.name: project
options.description: Set the folder or zipped file containing the project. It overrides the default project.

options.name: url
options.description: Specify the domain URL. It overrides the SDF file settings.

options.name: email
options.description: Specify your email address. It overrides the SDF file settings.

options.name: account
options.description: Specify your account ID. It overrides the SDF file settings.

options.name: role
options.description: Specify the role ID. It overrides the SDF file settings.

importfiles.name: importfiles
importfiles.description: Import files from an account to your account customization project. You cannot import files from a SuiteApp.

options.name: paths
options.description: Specify the file cabinet paths of the files to import. For example, "/SuiteScripts".

options.name: excludeproperties
options.description: Exclude all file properties within the .attributes folder.

options.name: project
options.description: Set the folder or zipped file containing the project. It overrides the default project.

options.name: url
options.description: Specify the domain URL. It overrides the SDF file settings.

options.name: email
options.description: Specify your email address. It overrides the SDF file settings.

options.name: account
options.description: Specify your account ID. It overrides the SDF file settings.

options.name: role
options.description: Specify the role ID. It overrides the SDF file settings.

importobjects.name: importobjects
importobjects.description: Import custom objects from an account to your project.

options.name: appid
options.description: Specify your application ID. If specified, only custom objects with that application ID are imported. Otherwise, only custom objects with no application ID are imported.

options.name: scriptid
options.description: Specify the script ID. To specify multiple IDs, enter the IDs separated by spaces. Enter "ALL" to import all custom objects of the specified type.

options.name: type
options.description: Specify the type of custom objects to import. Enter "ALL" to import all custom objects. To see what custom objects are supported by SDF, see https://system.netsuite.com/app/help/helpcenter.nl?fid=sdf xml.html.

options.name: destinationfolder
options.description: Specify the project folder where objects will be stored. It must be within the Objects folder of your project. For example, /Objects/MyObjects.

options.name: project
options.description: Set the folder or zipped file containing the project. It overrides the default project.

options.name: url
options.description: Specify the domain URL. It overrides the SDF file settings.

options.name: email
options.description: Specify your email address. It overrides the SDF file settings.

options.name: account
options.description: Specify your account ID. It overrides the SDF file settings.

options.name: role
options.description: Specify the role ID. It overrides the SDF file settings.

listbundles.name: listbundles
listbundles.description: List the bundles installed in an account.

options.name: url
options.description: The domain url.

options.name: email
options.description: The user's email.

options.name: account
options.description: Specify your account ID. It overrides the SDF file settings.

options.name: role
options.description: Specify the role ID. It overrides the SDF file settings.

listconfiguration.name: listconfiguration
listconfiguration.description: List the features that are available in an account.

options.name: url
options.description: The domain url.

options.name: email
options.description: The user's email.

options.name: account
options.description: Specify your account ID. It overrides the SDF file settings.

options.name: role
options.description: Specify the role ID. It overrides the SDF file settings.

listfiles.name: listfiles
listfiles.description: List the files from the file cabinet.

options.name: folder
options.description: Specify the File Cabinet path, for example, "/SuiteScripts". All files within subfolders are included.

options.name: url
options.description: The domain url.

options.name: email
options.description: The user's email.

options.name: account
options.description: Specify your account ID. It overrides the SDF file settings.

options.name: role
options.description: Specify the role ID. It overrides the SDF file settings.

listmissingdependencies.name: listmissingdependencies
listmissingdependencies.description: List the missing dependencies of the project.

options.name: log
options.description: Sets the log file location, as either a directory or a file name. If it is a directory, a default log file is generated in the specified location. If a log file already exists in the specified location, log details are appended to that existing file.

options.name: project
options.description: Set the folder or zipped file containing the project. It overrides the default project.

options.name: url
options.description: Specify the domain URL. It overrides the SDF file settings.

options.name: email
options.description: Specify your email address. It overrides the SDF file settings.

options.name: account
options.description: Specify your account ID. It overrides the SDF file settings.

options.name: role
options.description: Specify the role ID. It overrides the SDF file settings.

listobjects.name: listobjects
listobjects.description: List the custom objects deployed in an account.

options.name: appid
options.description: Specify your application ID. If specified, only custom objects with that application ID are listed. Otherwise, only custom objects with no application ID are listed.

options.name: scriptid
options.description: Specify the script ID. If you specify it, only objects containing that script ID will be listed. Otherwise, all objects are listed.

options.name: type
options.description: Specify the type of custom objects to list. To specify multiple types, enter the types separated by spaces. Otherwise, all types are listed. To see what custom objects are supported by SDF, see https://system.netsuite.com/app/help/helpcenter.nl?fid=sdf xml.html.

options.name: url
options.description: The domain url.

options.name: email
options.description: The user's email.

options.name: account
options.description: Specify your account ID. It overrides the SDF file settings.

options.name: role
options.description: Specify the role ID. It overrides the SDF file settings.

preview.name: preview
preview.description: Preview the deployment steps of a folder or zipped file containing the project. The project folder is zipped before previewing.

options.name: log
options.description: Specify the preview log file location, as either a directory path or a file name. If it is a directory, a default log file is generated in the specified location. If a log file already exists in the specified location, preview log details are appended to that existing file.

options.name: applycontentprotection
options.description: Apply the content protection settings from the hiding.xml and locking.xml files.

options.name: accountspecificvalues
options.description: Indicate how to handle the presence of account-specific values in an account customization project. If there are account-specific values in the project, enter WARNING to continue with the deployment process, or ERROR to stop it. If the option is not specified, the default value is ERROR.

update.description: Overwrite the custom objects in the project with the custom objects in an account.

options.name: scriptid
options.description: Specify the script ID of the objects you want to overwrite.

updatecustomrecordwithinstances.description: Overwrite the custom record object and all its instances in the project with the ones in an account.

options.description: Specify the script ID.

uploadfiles.name: uploadfiles
uploadfiles.description: Upload files from your project to an account.

options.name: paths
options.description: Specify the file cabinet paths of the files to upload. To specify multiple paths, enter a space between paths and enclose the entire argument in double quotes. For example, "/SuiteScripts/File.js" "/SuiteScripts/NewFile.js".

options.name: role

uploadfolders.name: uploadfolders
uploadfolders.description: Upload files within specific folders from your project to an account.

options.name: paths
options.description: Specify the file cabinet paths of the files to upload. To specify multiple paths, enter a space between paths and enclose the entire argument in double quotes. For example, "/SuiteScripts" "/SuiteScripts/Test".

options.description: Sets the validation log file location, as either a directory or a file name. If it is a directory, a default log file is generated in the specified location. If a log file already exists in the specified location, validation log details are appended to that existing file.

options.name: server
options.description: Indicates that the server will perform the validation.
